author: Tony Tellez
title: North Carolina Tar Heels vs. Pittsburgh Panthers Pick Prediction NCAA College Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-29-2015
text:
Tony Tellez | October 25, 2015 
The North Carolina Tar Heels are off to the road to meet the Pittsburgh Panthers in an NCAA college football game scheduled for Thursday October 29th. NORTH CAROLINA VS PITTSBURGH FREE NCAA FOOTBALL WINNER CALL 888-711-4311– Tonys Courtesy Line Dial 1-888-711-4311 to receive this free pick by phone immediately. Outside of the US and Canada to receive this free pick by phone with no charge Click Here . 
Start Time: 7PM ET 
TV: ESPN 
Point Spread Odds: North Carolina -2 ½ points 
Notes: The teams met in 2014 with North Carolina earning the 40-35 home victory as a -2 point favorite. The game went over 67 points. North Carolina is 6-1 on the year with the 26-13 home victory last week to the Virginia Cavaliers as a -16 ½ point wagering favorite. The game total went under 58 points. The Tar Heels had a balanced attack in the win. They ran for 196 yards in the win for over 5 yards per carry. North Carolina benefitted by forcing five Virginia turnovers and won the turnover battle by a +3 margin. The Tar Heels held Virginia to 148 passing yards and pick off our Matt Johns passes. North Carolina is 16th in the nation in scoring defense by allowing 16.7 points per game. 
Pittsburgh is improves to 6-1 following the 23-20 road victory last week to the Syracuse Orange as a -9 ½ point wagering favorite. The game ended at under 49 points. The Panthers had 427 yards of offense with 188 running. They held the Orange to 353 offensive yards and won the turnover battle by a +2 margin. Pittsburgh is 16th in total defense by allowing 309 yards per game. 
North Carolina Tar Heels versus Pittsburgh Panthers Free Pick : This college football
